metadata.title: Easy Instant Oats Idli or Steamed Oats Cake Recipe- South Indian Recipe
metadata.description:
Oats Idli or steamed oats cake, by adding oats idlis got a healthy makeover. 
ðŸ‘‰Recipe: https://bit.ly/3EUXsuy
Connect with me via:
Fb: https://www.facebook.com/CookingwithThas/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/thasneen
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/thasneen/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cookingwiththas/

transcription: [00:00.000] Take rolled oats and grind them into a fine powder.
[00:10.000] Mix yogurt and water to make a smooth batter.
[00:20.000] Add the oats powder to the yogurt batter and stir well.
[00:30.000] Add salt, baking soda, and baking powder. Mix gently.
[00:45.000] Let the batter rest for 10 minutes.
[00:55.000] Meanwhile, chop vegetables if you want to add them.
[01:05.000] Grease idli molds lightly with oil.
[01:15.000] Pour the batter into the idli molds and steam for 10-12 minutes.
[01:45.000] Check if idlis are cooked by inserting a toothpick.
[01:55.000] Remove from molds and serve hot with chutney or sambar.
